name: Aadi's Odyssey
description:
Aadi’s Odyssey is an interactive narrative experience that tells the story of a man named Aadi, his wife Gita and his daughter Aahana. 

Set in the 1800’s, the game is a fictionalized tale about the some of the first Indian indentured sugarcane labourers who came to South Africa, on the ship the Belvedere, which arrived at the British colony of Natal on the 26th of November 1860. While his family is asleep on the ship, Aadi finds himself reflecting on and walking through important memories from his life which led him to his journey to Natal...as he arrives at his new home of new beginnings.
